author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
There have recently been phishing attacks on both the Rust Crates Ecosystem and NPM for Javascript and since they're both pretty similar I've decided to just bundle them together.

title: NPM And Rust Are Constantly Under Attack
